items.title: Book Riot’s Deals of the Day for September 12, 2025
items.description: Kick off your weekend with double batch of book deals, featuring thrilling, creepy reads, witchy romance, modern retellings, and more

items.title: The Longlisted Fiction Books Everyone Will Be Talking About
items.description: The National Book Awards Fiction longlist is here, AUDITION is getting an adaptation, a nationwide literacy event, and more.

items.title: The 2025 National Book Award Longlist for Fiction
items.description: Eight of this year's authors on the National Book Award Longlist for Fiction have been honored previously.

items.title: The IMLS’s Freedom Trucks Project Is Propaganda in Support of Historical Erasure: Book Censorship News, September 12, 2025
items.description: This week, the IMLS announced their Freedom Trucks initiative. It is blatant propaganda.

items.title: Latin America, According to Superhero Comics
items.description: How have superhero comics treated the vast lands, cultures, and people of Latin America? Not the best, but it is getting better.
